alert.note: Alert for Harris; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 4:52PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Troup and western Harris Counties through 515 PM EST ... At 451 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Fairfax to near Beulah to near Griffen Mill, and moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Pine Mountain, Goat Rock Lake, Mountain Hill, Jones Crossroads, Mulberry Grove, Whitesville-Pine Lake, and Lake Harding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
